Reborn:Fester.NAME: Fester

Reborn:UndeadAgility.NAME: Undead Agility
Reborn:UndeadAgility.DESCRIPTION: Your first Attack each turn costs 1 less.

Reborn:Undeath.NAME: Undeath

Reborn:AgileSwipe.NAME: Agile Swipe
Reborn:AgileSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you have played three attacks this turn, gain [E] and draw a card.

Reborn:BitterSpiral.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Shroud. NL Undeath: Deal !D! damage to all enemies instead.

Reborn:LaunchEntrails.NAME: Launch Entrails
Reborn:LaunchEntrails.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. Necrotic.

Reborn:Bladestorm.NAME: Bladestorm
Reborn:Bladestorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage once for each card played this turn.

Reborn:CrystallizeEssence.NAME: Crystallize Essence
Reborn:CrystallizeEssence.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Shroud. If you are undead, convert your Shroud into Block.

Reborn:HellboundTechnique.NAME: Hellbound Technique
Reborn:HellboundTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block. Discard a card, then Dredge 3. Gain !M! Shroud. Necrotic.

Reborn:GrislyCarapace.NAME: Grisly Carapace
Reborn:GrislyCarapace.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Dredge a card, gain !M! Block.

Reborn:DeathInDuplets.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Discard 2 cards. NL Dredge 2.

Reborn:BlowFromBelow.NAME: Blow from Below
Reborn:BlowFromBelow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Whenever you draw this card, halve its damage this turn.

Reborn:GleanFromGore.DESCRIPTION: Dredge !M!. NL Put an Infection on top of your draw pile.

Reborn:Affliction.NAME: Affliction
Reborn:Affliction.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain !M! Shroud.

Reborn:SinisterScrying.DESCRIPTION: Dredge X, where X is the number of unique card types in your discard pile.

Reborn:BlisterFlesh.NAME: Blister Flesh
Reborn:BlisterFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Put an Infection on top of your draw pile.

Reborn:PsychicBlind.NAME: Psychic Blind
Reborn:PsychicBlind.DESCRIPTION: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. Discard the top 3 cards of your draw pile.

Reborn:ChannelMemory.NAME: Channel Memory
Reborn:ChannelMemory.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dredge !M!. NL If you are undead, the dredged cards are retained.

Reborn:SickeningPall.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your draw pile. NL Deal !D! damage once for each card in your discard pile.

Reborn:GraveStrength.NAME: Grave Strength
Reborn:GraveStrength.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the start of your turn, if this card is in your discard pile, gain !M! Strength this turn.

Reborn:GraveExpulsion.NAME: Grave Expulsion
Reborn:GraveExpulsion.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.
Reborn:GraveExpulsion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to the number of cards in your discard pile.

Reborn:DetriticDefenses.NAME: Detritic Defenses
Reborn:DetriticDefenses.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each unique card type in your discard pile.
Reborn:DetriticDefenses.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each unique card type in your discard pile.

Reborn:Compost.NAME: Compost
Reborn:Compost.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw a card for each unique card type in your discard pile.
Reborn:Compost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Draw a card for each unique card type in your discard pile plus one.

Reborn:ShrieK.NAME: Shriek
Reborn:ShrieK.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, discard the top !M! card of your draw pile.
Reborn:ShrieK.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, discard the top !M! cards of your draw pile.

Reborn:Metamorphosis.NAME: Metamorphosis
Reborn:Metamorphosis.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL If your discard pile is larger than your draw pile, become undead.
Reborn:Metamorphosis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Drawm !M! cards. NL If your discard pile is larger than your draw pile, become undead.
